original_text: But Naaman's servants went to him. One of them said, ‘My master, the prophet might have asked you to do something very difficult. Then you surely would have done it! Now he says to you, “Wash yourself! Then you will be clean.” That is much easier for you to do.’
korean_text: 그의 종들이 나아와서 말하여 이르되 내 아버지여 선지자가 당신에게 큰 일을 행하라 말하였더면 행하지 아니하였으리이까 하물며 당신에게 이르기를 씻어 깨끗하게 하라 함이리이까 하니

sentences.original_text: But Naaman's servants went to him
the prophet might have asked you to do something very difficult
sentences.korean_translation: 선지자님이 매우 어려운 것을 하라고 하셨을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: Then you surely would have done it!
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 분명히 그것을 했을 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: That is much easier for you to do.'
